Delete:
rx_pointer[6:0]<=7'b0000001; //new frame
       rx_pointer[6:0]<=7'b0001000; //anticipate burst
       rx_pointer[6:0]<={rx_pointer[5:0],1'b0};//middle of frame
Add:
rx_pointer[6:0] <= 7'b0000001; //new frame
       rx_pointer[6:0] <= 7'b0001000; //anticipate burst
       rx_pointer[6:0] <= {rx_pointer[5:0],1'b0};//middle of frame
